channel.title: The BEMA Podcast
channel.description: The BEMA Podcast is a walk-through of the context of the Bible and the Text itself, as well as surrounding history. We deconstruct our common readings of the Bible and attempt to reconstruct them through the lens of historical context. The main body of work is contained in Seasons 1–5, and we encourage you to start with episode 0 and continue in order through episode 204. BEMA Discipleship is a ministry of Impact Campus Ministries.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Love God. Love others. Become people of the Text.

item.content:encoded:
A simplified version of the daily prayer from Deuteronomy 6 and Leviticus 19. This recording is meant to follow Episode 21.

Sh'ma Israel, adonai elohenu, adonai echad
Ve'ahavta et adonai eloiekah
     b'khol levavkah
     uve'khol naphshekah
     uve'khol meodeikah
Ve'ahavta reyacha c'mocha

Hear, O Israel! The Lord is our God, the Lord alone.
Love the Lord your God
     with all your heart,
     with all your soul,
     and with all your might.
And love your neighbor as yourself.
